tip1.title: Monitor Search Lost IS (Budget)
tip1.description: If this is high, you are losing easy wins. Use this metric in Flipika to justify budget increases to your clients.

tip2.title: Segment by Match Type
tip2.description: Broad vs Exact performance often varies wildly. Use our 'Segment By' feature to visualize the ROAS difference instantly.

tip3.title: Day of Week Analysis
tip3.description: B2B campaigns often burn cash on weekends. Use the heatmap visualization to identify wasted spend hours.

tip4.title: Quality Score Tracking
tip4.description: Don't just look at current QS. Track its history. Flipika logs daily snapshots so you can prove your optimization work improved score.

tip5.title: Device Performance
tip5.description: Mobile conversion rates are often lower. Should you bid down? Check the device comparison chart before deciding.

tip6.title: Actual Search Terms
tip6.description: Show clients what they are paying for. A word cloud of actual search terms can be very revealing and build trust.

tip7.title: Conversion Delay
tip7.description: Explain why last week's results look low. Use the time-lag report to show clients that conversions take time to mature.

faq.q1: Is this template suitable for small budgets?
faq.a1: Yes, absolutely. Whether you spend $500 or $500,000, the metrics (CPA, CTR, ROAS) remain the key indicators of success. Flipika scales with you.
faq.q2: Can I combine Google and Bing data?
faq.a2: Currently native integration is Google Ads. Microsoft Ads (Bing) integration is on our roadmap for late 2026. You can use manual data blocks for Bing in the meantime.
faq.a3: 100% accurate. We pull directly from the Google Ads API without sampling. What you see in Flipika matches your Google Ads dashboard exactly.
faq.q4: Can I share this with my team?
faq.a4: Yes, you can invite unlimited team members to view or edit the reports depending on their permissions. Great for internal collaboration.
faq.a5: Yes, all conversion actions defined in your Google Ads account are importable. You can filter reports to show only specific conversion labels.
faq.q6: Is there a limit on historical data?
faq.a6: We typically pull the last 24 months of data upon connection, allowing you to do Year-over-Year comparisons immediately.
faq.a7: Yes, on our Agency plan, you can map a custom domain (e.g., reports.agency.com) so the client never sees 'Flipika'.
faq.a8: We use OAuth 2.0 with strictly read-only scopes. We cannot change your ads or spend your budget. We are verified by Google Security.
